context: Hi Can you recommend some movies for me to watch? I've recently watched Up (2009) again and have always loved that movie.
I can! What style do you like?
Up is great! Have you seen WALL-E (2008) ?
Yes I love that one too.
Oh my god that is one of my all time favorites. That little rat is just such a great little chef.
Oh! Me too! I still don't want to eat there, but the story warms my heart
Ha ha! yes it is quite adorable!
resp: Did you see The Good Dinosaur (2015) ?
